title: Local navigation using tb for android
creator: dfbgn2
content: My android phone has access to a USB pen-drive on which I placed a backup copy of all my TB folders. Can I use TB for android locally to read these emails? How? Thank you.

title: Sent folder not updating

content: Sent folder not updating. Solutions in forum don't work. All settings believed correct. Must be a bug still not fixed? Thanks

title: Can't attach file
creator: jack.rabo
content:
Hello, Samsung S22/Android 15/oneui 7 user here, recently looks like i can't attach files to drafts and emails i respond to. Attachment process (that goes through Android file and folder view) doesn't work.

When it goes well i can select attachments, confirm, but no attachments are present in the email. When it goes bad the app (that goes in background) crashes and android suggests to clear app cache (it doesn't work)

This bug is annoying, please fix... I don't want to go back to crap gmail or ultra heavy outlook
